settings.text: Click on some of the most frequently asked questions below to see if we have your answer.

settings.question: Do you ship internationally?
settings.answer: Currently, the only country we ship to outside of the United States of America is Canada. We will be shipping into other countries effective September 1st, 2019.

settings.question: How much is shipping?
settings.answer:
Shipping & Handling Charges are as follows:

  • Free for domestic, all states within the USA.
  • $14.95 flat fee for Canada.

settings.question: How long before I can receive my order?
settings.answer: Currently, the only country we ship to outside of the United States of America is Canada. We will be shipping into other countries effective September 1st, 2019.

settings.question: What carrier do you use?
settings.answer: Currently, the only country we ship to outside of the United States of America is Canada. We will be shipping into other countries effective September 1st, 2019.

settings.question: Do you ship to P.O./APO/FPO?
settings.answer: Currently, the only country we ship to outside of the United States of America is Canada. We will be shipping into other countries effective September 1st, 2019.

settings.question: ﻿Countries we ship to
settings.answer: USA, Canada

settings.question: ﻿Can I only purchase products through the website?
settings.answer: Yes, our products can only be obtained via our Official Online Store https://amarose.com/

settings.question: ﻿Can I change my order?
settings.answer: Please contact support@amarose.com as soon as possible. We will do our best to accommodate your request however there is no guarantee that any changes can be made once an order is placed.

settings.question: ﻿Can I cancel my order?
settings.answer: Yes, you may, as long as the order has not been shipped.

settings.question: C﻿an I return my order?
settings.answer:
Yes, should you not be 100% satisfied, we will gladly exchange or refund your purchase within 30-days.
In the unlikely event that a product arrived damage, the customer must contact customer service within 48 hours of receipt. Customer must include photos of the issue and a screenshot of your order confirmation email.

settings.question: ﻿Can I exchange my product?
settings.answer: Yes, within 30-days of receipt as long as the product has not been consumed (for consumables).

settings.question: ﻿How can I check the status of my order?
settings.answer: Please log in to your account to check the status of your order. If you do not have an account, please refer to your shipping confirmation email to track your order. Or you can check your order status at: https://amarose.com/pages/order-lookup

settings.question: ﻿Why was I charged twice?
settings.answer: You will only be charged for what you purchased, if you see duplicate charges, please give it a few days and it should fall off and the issue should be rectified automatically. However if it still remains and you are positive you only placed one order, please send us an email to support@amarose.com with a screenshot of the duplicate charge for further assistance.

settings.question: ﻿What forms of payment do you accept?
settings.answer: We accept online payments through Visa, Mastercard and American Express

settings.question: ﻿My items arrived damaged, what should I do?
settings.answer: Please contact us immediately at support@amarose.com. Please provide us with your order number and some photos of the damage product/s.

settings.question: ﻿I recieved incorrect item/s, what should I do?
settings.answer: Please contact support@amarose.com as soon as possible so that we can take care of this for you. Please provide us with your order number along with a photo of the incorrect item you received.

settings.question: ﻿My package is stuck and trucking shows no movement, what do I do?
settings.answer: For domestic orders, package can only be considered lost if there has been no movement for 10 business days from the day it was shipped. Please send an email to support@amarose.com if your shipment shows no movement from the carrier's tracking information.

settings.question: ﻿I put the wrong address on my order, please help!
settings.answer: Please be careful when entering your shipping address, Limitless will not be responsible for orders sent to the incorrect delivery address provided by the customer.

settings.question: ﻿How can I find out more information about a product?
settings.answer: Product details can be found on the product page but if you have more questions, please free to email us at support@amarose.com

settings.question: ﻿Do I have to set up an account to place an order?
settings.answer: No. You do not have to have an account to place an order.

settings.question: ﻿How do I create an account?
settings.answer: You can create an account by visiting https://amarose.com/pages/create-account
